title: Terence Davies, lyrical British filmmaker, dies at 77
description: His acclaimed debut feature, “Distant Voices, Still Lives,” drew on his traumatic upbringing. He later examined the poets Emily Dickinson and Siegfried Sassoon.

title: Amid so much death, Israelis struggle to lay their loved ones to rest
description: More than 900 people have been killed in Israel, but ongoing military operations and a chaotic government response means families are still waiting to hold funerals.

title: Russia cites ‘concern’ but does not condemn Hamas attack on Israel
description: Russia is usually quick to denounce terrorism. But with Moscow relying on Iranian drones in Ukraine, it called the Hamas attack an “escalation” and blamed the West.

title: The Israeli-Palestinian conflict: A chronology
description: A wave of attacks by Palestinian militants on Israel, and Israel’s declaration of war against Hamas, has brought new attention to an old problem.

title: Video shows apparent death of Israeli hostages in Hamas custody
description: At least four Israelis taken hostage by Hamas on Saturday were killed soon after being taken captive, according to videos reviewed by The Washington Post.

title: Fate of Israeli hostages consumes and unifies a terrorized nation
description: The families of more than 100 Israelis thought be held captive inside of Gaza are growing ever more desperate for information as full-scale war looms.

title: The Gaza Strip and its history, explained
description: As Israel and Hamas are at war, many are watching the violence on the Gaza Strip, one of the world’s most densely populated and impoverished strips of land.

title: ‘Nobody was prepared’ for earthquake that ravaged western Afghanistan
description: Houses collapsed within seconds, killing mostly women and children, charities said after first assessments on Monday.

title: The Israeli-Palestinian conflict: A chronology
description: A wave of attacks by Palestinian militants on Israel, and Israel’s declaration of war against Hamas, has brought new attention to an old problem.

title: Israel amassed troops in the West Bank. Then Hamas attacked from Gaza.
description: “Israel made a huge mistake believing that a terror organization can change its DNA,” said Yaakov Amidror, a former national security adviser. “We will not make it again.”

title: What is Hamas, and why did it attack Israel now?
description: Hamas surprised Israel, but its incursion comes after months of rising tensions over violence at al-Aqsa Mosque and the occupation and blockade of Palestinians.

title: Israel declares Gaza siege as Hamas fires rockets and toll mounts
description: On the third day of fighting, Hamas was still launching rockets against Israel while its fighters battled soldiers around the borders of the Gaza Strip.

title: In photos: Thousands dead, homes destroyed in Afghanistan earthquakes
description: Powerful earthquakes struck western Afghanistan’s Herat province, killing more than 2,400 people and injuring thousands, government officials said.

title: Economy vs. environment: Some Taiwanese consider cashing in their chips
description: Taiwan’s semiconductor industry provides it with economic and national security. But some locals are questioning whether the environmental burden is worth it.

title: How Israel’s Iron Dome air defense system disables some Hamas rockets
description: Though Hamas launched thousands of rockets into southern Israel on Saturday, most did not strike targets, according to the country’s defense forces.

title: Israel-Hamas conflict live updates: Fighting continues in southern Israel, with death toll expected to rise
description: The attacks in Israel and Gaza have left hundreds dead and an unknown number of hostages on each side. Biden has promised Netanyahu U.S. military support.

title: Biden administration scrambles to deter wider Mideast conflict
description: As Israel prepares a ground offensive in Gaza, the White House sends military aid to Jerusalem and moves to prevent a crisis across the wider Middle East.
